definition: Post (in the name of a newspaper)

sentences.english: The report on this scandal appeared on the front-page of the Washington Post.
sentences.chinese: 這樁醜聞的報道出現在了《華盛頓郵報》的頭版。

sentences.english: Lachlan had little turf to call his own but the Post.
sentences.chinese: 老大隻有紐約郵報一塊小地盤。

sentences.english: The Seattle Post-Intelligencer printed its final edition yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 《西雅圖郵報》於昨日發行最後一期紙質報。

sentences.english: Recently a Bangkok Post editorial accused China of “Killing the Mekong”.
sentences.chinese: 最近《曼谷郵報》一篇社論譴責中國“謀殺湄公河”。

sentences.english: Why should this prompt the Mail to demand that its executive readers feel outraged?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼每日郵報提示要求它的讀者對此感到憤怒？

sentences.english: Growth has permitted the social stratification which even the Daily Mail now laments.
sentences.chinese: 經濟增長使社會分層，甚至《每日郵報》都爲此感傷。

sentences.english: Iagree with the judgment of The Washington Post that the publishers quote onthe cover.
sentences.chinese: 我同意《華盛頓郵報》引用書扉頁上的判斷。

sentences.english: The Huffington Post confirmed Harington's quotes through translation.
sentences.chinese: 赫芬頓郵報通過翻譯證實了這確是哈靈頓所說的話。

sentences.english: I'm shocked, " he told the Toronto-based Globe and Mail.
sentences.chinese: 他在多倫多的《環球郵報》中說。

sentences.english: We are hugely grateful to all those who helped, particularly readers of The Mail on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 我們非常感謝所有人的幫助，特別是星期日郵報讀者。

sentences.english: That alone was a news scoop which would raise many eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 這篇報導是《華盛頓郵報》的獨家新聞。

sentences.english: 1877 - The Washington Post newspaper is first published.
This is evident by the fact he still goes to his seventh floor office at the Post every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天還去《華盛頓郵報》七樓辦公室上班。

sentences.english: He touted Evening Post from café to café.
sentences.chinese: 他在一家家咖啡館兜售《晚郵報》。

sentences.english: As the post explains, routine screenings may help provide that expedited diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 據《郵報》解釋，常規篩查可以爲此提供及時診斷。

sentences.english: Post officials said Broder died of complications from diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓郵報官方解釋他的死因是糖尿病併發症。
